results.name: Determinant of the symmetric n X n matrix M_n where M_n(j,k) = n for j = k, M_n(j,n) = n-j, M_n(n,k) = n-k, M_n(j,k) = 0 otherwise.
reference: J.-M. Monier, Algèbre et géometrie, exercices corrigés. Dunod, 1997, p. 78.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100
example: a(5) = determinant(M_5) = -625 where M_5 is the matrix
program: (MAGMA) [ Determinant( SymmetricMatrix( &cat[ [ i lt j select 0 else n: i in [1..j] ]: j in [1..n-1] ] cat [ 1+((n-1-k) mod n): k in [1..n] ] ) ): n in [1..18] ]; // _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 11 2010
